name: Oliver Twist
description:
This is the (hopefully) better balanced and more polished post-jam version!

A game made within a week for the public domain jam by

Shortee and Mario Helbing.

You are the orphan Oliver Twist and forced to work for the criminal gang leader Fagin. You'll need to pay him £15 each day or he will send the brutal robber Bill Sikes after you.
But there's a glimmer of hope, Sikes offers to let you go if you give him £150.

Pickpocket distracted pedestrians. But be careful, don't let the police see you while stealing.
